actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide additional flexibility to States in using funds allotted to them for fiscal year 1990.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize a State to obligate any remaining Federal water pollution control funds for certain projects in such State if progress toward achieving municipal compliance goals and deadlines of such Act is maintained.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide additional flexibility to States in using funds allotted to them for fiscal year 1990.
